Articles.Content:
Hi, is it possible to change the scale of the UI on realfuels it is a bit difficult to read, please let me know if I am missing something, I have adjusted the KSP UI's so I know how to do that just wondering if there is a config file I can modify to make real fuels UI larger. Thanks.

David.

1 hour ago, DaveB said:

Hi, is it possible to change the scale of the UI on realfuels it is a bit difficult to read, please let me know if I am missing something, I have adjusted the KSP UI's so I know how to do that just wondering if there is a config file I can modify to make real fuels UI larger. Thanks.

David.

Wrong forum because here is the Release-Forum. Please ask in the RealFuels-Thread.
